alert.note: Alert for Forest; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 7:17PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW SHOWERS EXPECTED THROUGH EARLY TUESDAY... Very cold air moving across Lake Superior will produce lake effect snow showers through early Tuesday morning across far north- central Wisconsin. The most significant snowfall is expected this evening into the early morning hours of Tuesday. The highest snow accumulations are expected in Vilas County, especially across the northwest half of the county where 2 to near 4 inches are possible. An inch or less is expected elsewhere. If you are traveling across north-central Wisconsin and the Upper Peninsula of Michigan, you may encounter rapidly changing weather and road conditions within the lake effect snow showers. Remember to reduce your speed and allow plenty of distance between you and the vehicle ahead of you.
